subject: Re: svn commit: samba-web r1123 - in trunk: .
body:
Deryck,

 > > added ctdb link to main samba.org site
 > 
 > Just curious why this link ended up in the "Beyond samba.org" section
 > and the ldb and talloc links ended up in "Related Sites."

well, ctdb didn't really fit any of the categories very well. It
really is a core part of Samba, and we want people looking for
clustered Samba to go there.

please rearrange as you see fit though.

Cheers, Tridge
